inclusion.criterion: Recent stroke/TIA and severe stenosis of intracranial ICA or MCA
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Impaired CVR within previous three months but not before 3 weeks after acute stroke
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated heart failure, usually class 3 or 4
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD, but no recent stroke/TIA. He also has impaired CVR within the previous three months.
